body.name: Shoe Rack Organizer for Closet Entryway, 2-Tier Bamboo Stackable Shoe Rack Small Shoe Storage for Dorm Front Door Wooden Shoe Shelf, Natural
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 52 mins
features: SOLID BAMBOO MATERIALS: Bamboo is a stronger material than wood and will last longer. Thus, we choose renewable resource bamboo that grows in natural alpine areas. The texture is strong load-bearing, stable and durable. Each layer of the free standing shoe racks has a high load-bearing capacity. After the product is carbonized at a high temperature, it is waterproof and not easy to crack and deform.

EASY TO ASSEMBLE: We have upgraded the connection method of the shoe holder and no longer used plastic connectors to connect it, which greatly increases the stability of the shoe storage and avoids bending in the middle of the shoe rack. And the assembly process of the shoe shelf is simple and easy to understand, and everything needed will be included, so there is no need to search for tools. We will also include an installation tutorial for the small shoe rack for reference.

WIDE RANGE OF USES：Undoubtedly, this small shoe rack for entryway small space will keep your shoes in order. In addition, this shoe stand also has many other functions. It can be used as a bookshelf or flower rack in the living room or bedroom, as well as a towel rack in the bathroom, or even a small box for holding handicrafts, or anywhere you need to store things.

STACKABLE DESIGN: Whenever trying to save space or make room, we find ourselves stacking things one on top of the other. This organization and storage shelf was designed with perfect tenon design without stacking tools. As you see the top shelf has a little protrusion that allows for stacking. The shoe racks are connected by embedding grooves between the upper and lower frames. You can stack them to save space in the room while gaining additional storage.

QUALITY CUSTOMER SERVICE: Thank you for choosing our product, you didn't just get a great vertical shoe rack--you also supported our growth, which is pretty cool(at least we think so). We have always cherished every customer who trusts us. We hope your shopping experience is better than ever before, and we are standing by to help you if you have any problems! To make you 100% satisfied is our developing goal!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dikolre Bamboo Shoe Rack, Keeping Your Shoes Neatly Organized When shoes have a tendency to accumulate, one pair kicked inside the door quickly turns into several, which in no time snowballs into a physical barrier to your entryway and hallway, not to mention an immediate aesthetic affront to your home's decor. Dikolre bamboo shoe rack is the perfect storage organizer for dress shoes, sneakers, flip-flops, high-heeled shoes, and slippers. Instead of having your shoes jumbled up underneath a bed or cluttering up in the bottom of a closet, a small space-saver shoe rack keeps your footwear safely stored and easily accessible. Dikolre free-standing shoe rack with a compact, lightweight design, you can easily move the rack anywhere you need instant shoe storage. Otherwise, our Dikolre bamboo shoe rack with its classic and simple design meshes with most home decors, making it just an idea of a home for winter boots as well as summer sandals.
Stay 100% Organized with a Shoe Rack System
Featuring a stackable design, the shelves can be stacked on top of each other to save space. You can also integrate the rack with similar racks to create a vertical storage system.
Dikolre's Functional Design Smooth Panel without Burrs Tenon Joint Design Plastic Buckle Connector

Bring Aesthetic Value to Your Interior Space Provides efficient space-saving storage in any space, such as the entryway, closet, study room, office room, living room, bathroom, kitchen, hallway, bedroom, balcony, dormitory, etc. With a compact and lightweight design, this bamboo shoe rack will not take up too much room wherever you want to use it. Easy to assemble, this free-standing shoe rack comes with clear instructions and all the necessary hardware.

Bamboo Shoe Rack 2-Tier Natural Bamboo Shoe Rack 2-Tier White Bamboo Shoe Rack 2-Tier Black Bamboo Shoe Rack 3-Tier Natural Bamboo Shoe Rack 3-Tier Black Tier 2 2 2 3 3 Color Natural White Black Natural Black Material Bamboo Wood Bamboo Wood Bamboo Wood Bamboo Wood Bamboo Wood Size 11"D x 27.2"W x 12.5"H 11"D x 27.2"W x 12.5"H 11"D x 27.2"W x 12.5"H 11"D x 27.2"W x 18.3"H 11"D x 27.2"W x 18.3"H For Small Space ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Stackable Design ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Easy Installation ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdier than it looks!
reviews.reviewText: When I started assembling this, it seemed like it was going to be too flimsy to hold up. But once I got it all put together, it's much sturdier than I thought and is working out perfectly. I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I did put this together backwards at first but it was a quick fix, and I just used the wrench and screws that were provided.I needed something to use as a small shelf in my daughters room for a space that happens to be over a floor vent. This works great! I put a few toys on top and so far, so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my hallway
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to help clean up the shoe clutter. Easy to assemble and fits in my small entryway. I’m debating about getting a second one to stack on top. I love that it’s an option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but not sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and looks good. Problem is it keeps falling in the middle and I constantly have to connect it together again. Will do but not amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was just a jumble of wooden planks that ended up being a flimsy product for the price. It was a huge pain to put together and fell apart easily. Get yourself a metal shoe rack and avoid this product. It isn't worth the price, is difficult to assemble, and it is cheap and weak. It is light weight because it is garbage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A nightmare to assemble, and still doesn't hold together.
reviews.reviewText: From reading the recent reviews it seems this is hit or miss and some people certainly get duds that aren't worth their weight in salt. I shouldn't have risked it, honestly. I'm not picky and wasn't expecting much but found myself forcing this together to no avail. It could be the "natural" color is worse than the others, but the plastic connectors for the middle of the selves actually don't fit properly. I spent a lot of time trying to force them together and can get them on each side a few millimeters but they pop off with no weight on the shelves at all. I shouldn't have even bothered building the shelves but that was very difficult, too. The holes are too small for the screws so I certainly needed pliers to force the Allen wrench that came with it to turn more than a few times. I am surprised I didn't break the Allen wrench. I'm relatively strong so if it says "no extra tools needed" I shouldn't have had to do this and still work up such a sweat for so long. So now I have these shelves that I can't really put anything on. The description says each one can bear 40 pounds! That's actually funny, even if the connectors did fit there's just no way and we all know it. I would send this back but disassembling it and figuring out how to put all the pieces back in the box hardly seems worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect shoe rack!
reviews.reviewText: I searched for so many aesthetically pleasing and good quality shoe racks. This was a perfect find. I would definitely purchase another if I ever need to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I liked how it looked and it was fine to put together but the sturdiness was awful. It constantly fell apart. Returned.
